description: Displays the details of a gateway. The response includes the gateway Amazon Resource Name (ARN), name, and CIDR blocks, as well as details about the networks.

parameters.name: GatewayArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the gateway that you want to describe.

nested_items.name: EgressCidrBlocks
nested_items.description: The range of IP addresses that contribute content or initiate output requests for flows communicating with this gateway. These IP addresses should be in the form of a Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) block; for example, 10.0.0.0/16.

nested_items.name: GatewayArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway.

nested_items.name: GatewayMessages
nested_items.description: Messages with information about the gateway.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The specific error message that MediaConnect returns to help you understand the reason that the request did not succeed.

nested_items.name: GatewayState
nested_items.description: The current status of the gateway.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the gateway. This name can not be modified after the gateway is created.

nested_items.name: Networks
nested_items.description: The list of networks in the gateway.

nested_items.name: CidrBlock
nested_items.description: A unique IP address range to use for this network. These IP addresses should be in the form of a Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) block; for example, 10.0.0.0/16.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the network. This name is used to reference the network and must be unique among networks in this gateway.
